name: Farm Story Solitaire Tripeaks
description:
If you love Solitaire games and are looking for free brain games, then download Farm Story!
Farm Story is a high-quality tri-peaks solitaire game. It is very suitable for players of solitaire, classic solitaire, pyramid solitaire, spider solitaire, logic puzzle, mahjong, match-3 games and other casual games.

Features:
More than 200 free levels, with more in later version!
Exquisite graphics and beautiful themes
Interesting and unique special cards
Rest in the camp to get extra coins

Farm Story is a relaxing and fun free card game that everyone can play! It will take you through interesting farm life. Download and play Farm Story for free now!
